00001 /********************************************************************\
00002 
00003   Name:         MStoppedMuonsPerBlock
00004   Created by:   John R Quirk
00005 
00006   Contents:     A module to plot the number of stopped muons per block
00007 
00008 \********************************************************************/
00009 
00010 /* Standard includes */
00011 #include <stdlib.h>
00012 #include <string>
00013 #include <map>
00014 
00015 /* MIDAS includes */
00016 
00017 /* ROOT includes */
00018 #include <TH1I.h>
00019 
00020 /* AlCap includes */
00021 #include "TGlobalData.h"
00022 #include "TSetupData.h"
00023 
00024 using std::string;
00025 using std::map;
00026 using std::vector;
00027 
00028 
00029 /*-- Module declaration --------------------------------------------*/
00030 INT  MStoppedMuonsPerBlock_init(void);
00031 INT  MStoppedMuonsPerBlock(EVENT_HEADER*, void*);
00032 
00033 extern HNDLE hDB;
00034 extern TGlobalData* gData;
00035 extern TSetupData* gSetup;
00036 
00037 static TH1I* hNumberOfStoppedMuonsPerBlock;
00038 
00039 // Time windows
00040 static const double tw_muveto = 100.;
00041 static const double tw_sc = 100.;
00042 static const double tw_si = 100.;
00043 
00044 
00045 ANA_MODULE MStoppedMuonsPerBlock_module =
00046 {
00047   "MStoppedMuonsPerBlock",                    /* module name           */
00048   "John R Quirk",              /* author                */
00049   MStoppedMuonsPerBlock,                      /* event routine         */
00050   NULL,                          /* BOR routine           */
00051   NULL,                          /* EOR routine           */
00052   MStoppedMuonsPerBlock_init,                 /* init routine          */
00053   NULL,                          /* exit routine          */
00054   NULL,                          /* parameter structure   */
00055   0,                             /* structure size        */
00056   NULL,                          /* initial parameters    */
00057 };
00058 
00061 INT MStoppedMuonsPerBlock_init()
00062 {
00063   
00064   hNumberOfStoppedMuonsPerBlock = new TH1I("hNumberOfStoppedMuons","Number of (Possibly) Stopped Muons",2000,0.,2000.);
00065   return SUCCESS;
00066 }
00067 
00068 
00069 INT MStoppedMuonsPerBlock(EVENT_HEADER *pheader, void *pevent)
00070 {
00071 
00072   unsigned int nStopped = 0;
00073 
00074   // We assume the existance of all necessary TPI vectors
00075   std::map< std::string, std::vector<TPulseIsland*> >& tpis = gData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap;
00076   std::map< std::string, std::string>& dets = gSetup->fBankToDetectorMap;
00077   std::map< std::string, std::vector<TPulseIsland*> >::iterator iBank;
00078   std::vector<TPulseIsland*> *musc_pulses = NULL, *muveto_pulses = NULL, *scr_pulses = NULL, *scl_pulses = NULL;
00079   std::vector< std::vector<TPulseIsland*>* > sir_pulses, sil_pulses;
00080   std::vector<TPulseIsland*>::iterator c_musc_pulse, c_muveto_pulse, c_scr_pulse, c_scl_pulse;
00081   std::vector< std::vector<TPulseIsland*>::iterator > c_sir_pulse, c_sil_pulse;
00082 
00083   std::string cDet, cBank;
00084   int nSiL = 0, nSiR = 0;
00085   for (iBank = tpis.begin(); iBank != tpis.end(); iBank++) {
00086     cBank = iBank->first;
00087     cDet = dets[cBank];
00088     if (cDet == "muSc") {
00089       musc_pulses = &tpis.at(cBank);
00090       c_musc_pulse = musc_pulses->begin();
00091     } else if (cDet == "muVeto"){
00092       muveto_pulses = &tpis.at(cBank);
00093       c_muveto_pulse = muveto_pulses->begin();
00094     } else if (cDet == "ScR") {
00095       scr_pulses = &tpis.at(cBank);
00096       c_scr_pulse = scr_pulses->begin();
00097     } else if (cDet == "ScL") {
00098       scl_pulses = &tpis.at(cBank);
00099       c_scl_pulse = scl_pulses->begin();
00100     } else if (cDet.substr(0,2) == "Si" && cDet.substr(cDet.size()-5,4) == "fast") {
00101       if(cDet[2] == 'R') {
00102         sir_pulses.push_back(&tpis.at(cBank));
00103         c_sir_pulse.push_back(std::vector<TPulseIsland*>::iterator());
00104         nSiR++;
00105       } else {
00106         sil_pulses.push_back(&tpis.at(cBank));
00107         c_sil_pulse.push_back(std::vector<TPulseIsland*>::iterator());
00108         nSiL++;
00109       }
00110     }
00111   }
00112 
00113 
00114   double cTime = 0;
00115   for (; c_musc_pulse != musc_pulses->end(); c_musc_pulse++) {
00116     cTime = (*c_musc_pulse)->GetPulseTime();
00117 
00118     while ((*c_muveto_pulse)->GetPulseTime() < cTime)
00119       c_muveto_pulse++;
00120     while ((*c_scl_pulse)->GetPulseTime() < cTime)
00121       c_scl_pulse++;
00122     while ((*c_scr_pulse)->GetPulseTime() < cTime)
00123       c_scr_pulse++;
00124     for(int iSiR = 0; iSiR < nSiR; iSiR++)
00125       while ((*c_sir_pulse[iSiR])->GetPulseTime() < cTime)
00126         c_sir_pulse[iSiR]++;
00127     for (int iSiL = 0; iSiL < nSiL; iSiL++)
00128       while ((*c_sil_pulse[iSiL])->GetPulseTime() < cTime)
00129         c_sil_pulse[iSiL]++;
00130 
00131     if ((*c_muveto_pulse)->GetPulseTime() - cTime < tw_muveto)
00132       continue;
00133     if ((*c_scr_pulse)->GetPulseTime() - cTime < tw_sc)
00134       continue;
00135     if ((*c_scl_pulse)->GetPulseTime() - cTime < tw_sc)
00136       continue;
00137     for (int iSiR = 0; iSiR < nSiR; iSiR++)
00138       if ((*c_sir_pulse[iSiR])->GetPulseTime() - cTime < tw_si)
00139         continue;
00140     for (int iSiL = 0; iSiL < nSiL; iSiL++)
00141       if ((*c_sil_pulse[iSiL])->GetPulseTime() - cTime < tw_si)
00142         continue;
00143 
00144     nStopped++;
00145   }
00146 
00147   hNumberOfStoppedMuonsPerBlock->Fill(nStopped);
00148 
00149   return SUCCESS;
00150 }
